dublin_core.dcvalue: a The use of information technology IT based solutions for quality health delivery in regional health information networks and the study of the enabling factors for their use in a regional health care network from key classes of users such as the medical personnel and the citizens b Identification of potential technologies for usage from all citizens and health providers in a regional environment in all aspects of everyday life c Presentation of a generic user model for reference when developing and assessing IT based health delivery solutions
Information technology can enhance quality in regional health delivery.
